JELLYFIN_SHOW_ALL_ALBUM_TRACKS: Show all tracks when viewing an album
JELLYFIN_SHOW_ALL_PLAYLIST_TRACKS: Show all tracks when viewing a playlist
JELLYFIN_PLAY_ADD_DESC: You can play or add tracks under certain items to the queue. You can, for example, play songs by an artist or matching a genre. The following settings limit the number of tracks that will be played or queued each time. Note that they do not apply when you are playing or adding all tracks from within an album or playlist. In such cases, Volumio will commit all songs currently displayed in the tracklist.
JELLYFIN_NO_MAX_TRACKS_SINGLE_ALBUM: - Do not apply to play / add single Album
JELLYFIN_NO_MAX_TRACKS_SINGLE_PLAYLIST: - Do not apply to play / add single Playlist
JELLYFIN_SETTINGS_ERR_ITEMS_PER_PAGE: Some settings cannot be saved: Items Per Page must be greater than 0.
JELLYFIN_SETTINGS_ERR_MAX_TRACK: Some settings cannot be saved: Maximum Number of Tracks must be greater than 0.
JELLYFIN_SETTINGS_ERR_RESULT_COUNT: Some settings cannot be saved. Check that Result Count is greater than 0.
JELLYFIN_SETTINGS_ERR_NUM_ITEMS: Some settings cannot be saved. Check that Number of Items is greater than 0.
